channel.description: DNS and Time Sync Review Questions Q. Maximum number of nameservers that can be defined in the resolver configuration file? A. Three. Q. What is the purpose of a drift file in Chrony/NTP? A. The purpose of a drift file is to keep track of the rate at which the system clock gains or losses time. Q. The Chrony client is preconfigured when the chrony software package is installed. You just need to start the service to synchronize the clock. True or False? A. True.
